title: Spicy Turkey Livers
directions: Wash and clean the livers, dice the onion.
On a pan heat the oil and lightly fry the onion. Then add livers and stir them until they brown a little.
Add black pepper, caraway, paprika, majoram, chillies and a bit of water. Mix it well, cover and let simmer until the livers are soft.
At the end add a bit of flour and simmer for a few more minutes. Then add salt and you're done!
